Author: Aronâ€œXuanLeeeeeeâ€œGoldberg#3393
Content: Is there a guideline for changing an ERC20 token to the Komodo chain? Effort, costs, advantages, supporting assistants etc?

Author: polycryptoblog#1173
Content: @AronXuanGoldberg#3393   You can forward them to partners@komodoplatform.com or one of our service providers to see what kind of migration they are looking for .  Biggest advantage for switching over is not being restrained by Eth gas and lower costs if they wish to do future integrations .

Author: polycryptoblog#1173
Content: Typically a snapshot and airdrop of the new coin needs done , some wish to remove from circulation the old Eth which is another step .   Lowest cost is free as they can do this by themselves if they need ,  otherwise cost is dependent on the service provider and the man-hours needed.  Benefits : no gas fees,  reduced cost for other Komodo integrations like DPoW and Atomicdex listing ,  CC development
